title: FIX YOUR SERVERS RIOT
body: Ok, I have consistently for the past day and a half been getting server lag or having friends / other in - game players experience extreme lag, from 100 ping to not even knowing whats going on because it just shows your champion moving in place and everyone else standing still this is getting EXTREMELY annoying. For my 2 years of playing league there have been frequent times when they just say eh screw it, and make the NA servers lag without care. I know it's not an internet connection issue on my part because i can host 1080p streams and watch them perfectly fine, I also have other players in every single game in the past day and a half, 4 out of the 10 players in the game will get lag with the servers, i even had a game that everybody in the game was playing terribly because of lag. FIX YOUR SERVERS RIOT! I'm tired of having every other week have fking lag issues spread, and i ahvent heard it from any other sides of the world playing. Nope, JUST NA! FIX THEM NOW!

replies.body: If you are able to access other online content just fine but experiencing problems staying connected with league, then you may be having a packet loss issue.  Please run a [Log Reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which will help find any areas of weakness with your connection to our servers, and it will provide a list of steps to troubleshoot your specific issue.  Please let me know if your issue persists after, and we can take a deeper look,

While you mar not be experiencing connectivity issues outside of League, there could still be an issue on your end creating the lag. [Troubleshoot them.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Let us know if your connectivity improves or not. If it doesn't, do not hesitate to let us know.
